FuncDef: This command defines a maximum total rate for all subscriber egress queues for each subscriber associated with the sub-profile. Theegress-agg-rate-limitcommand is mutually exclusive with the egress-scheduler-policy. When an egress-scheduler-policy is defined on the sub-profile, theegress-agg-rate-limitcommand will fail. If the egress-agg-rate-limitcommand is specified, at attempt to bind anegress-scheduler-policyto the sub-profile will fail.

ParaDef.Info: Defines the maximum aggregate rate the egress queues associated with the subscriber profile may operate. The value is specified in kilobits per second in a base 10 context. A value of 1 indicates a rate of 1000 bits per second. Values-1 to 40000000, max kb/s.
